name: #RageQuit
description:
#RageQuit is exactly as it sounds--an impossible platformer. Can you get through all the levels? How many times will you die trying?

Please note that the leaderboard is local only! This means there is no online leaderboard for comparison with others.

Comment how many attempts it took you to get through the game if you'd like! 

Art and programming by Jammy.

Sound effects and music:

https://opengameart.org/content/8-wet-squish-slurp-impacts

https://opengameart.org/content/8-bit-sound-effects-library

https://opengameart.org/content/jump-and-run-8-bit

Follow me on Twitter for more game updates:
